About

Builder, physicist at heart, product partner in practice

Rooted in systems thinking, I orchestrate immersive experiences that feel tactile without compromising accessibility or performance.

I love designing interactions that respond with intention. Whether it's steering a WebGL arena, animating a data dashboard, or crafting the quiet satisfaction of a good form submission, my focus is on experiences that communicate state through motion.

Past work spans R&D prototypes, production SaaS, and open-source tooling. I thrive where design, engineering, and storytelling overlap - translating ideas into launches that resonate with users.

Specialties

  • - Real-time web visualizations
  • - Design systems & developer experience
  • - Performance audits & observability

Playground

  • - Procedural shaders
  • - Physics-inspired UI
  • - Generative art collaborations
